text: Har kuco ʙosed, marg sumoro dar har zamon va makone darmejoʙad. Agar ci dar qasrhoi mahkam va manzilhoi ʙalande ʙosed. Va zamone, ki az neki az farovonii mol va farzandon va salomati ʙarxurdor ʙosand, megujand: In az coniʙi Alloh ast. Va agar musiʙat va muskilie ʙar onho ʙirasad va ducori faqr va ʙemori va az dast dodani farzandon va duston gardand, megujand: Ej Muhammad (sallallohu alajhi va sallam)! in ʙa saʙaʙi cize ast, ki tu pesi mo ovardai. Bigu: "Hama az coniʙi Alloh ast". In mardumro ci sudaast, ki hec suxanero namefahmand va ʙa fahmidani on nazdik ham namesavand
